title: Keir Starmer live updates: UK prime minister faces calls to resign
desc: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s battle to stay in post over revelations about his former ambassador’s ties to Jeffrey Epstein is bolstered by support from all Cabinet members.

title: Margot Robbie’s Daring ‘Wuthering Heights’ Press Tour Shoes
desc: Margot Robbie has worn shoes from Manolo Blahnik, Christian Louboutin and more brands while promoting 'Wuthering Heights.'

title: B.C premier announces support for bid to have NATO bank HQ in Vancouver
desc: British Columbia Premier David Eby announced the province's support of a private-sector company's bid to have a NATO bank headquarters in Vancouver on Monday.

title: 'A cascade of errors': Johnathon Taituma died after St John ambulance delays, coroner finds
desc: A series of mistakes meant Johnathon Taituma, 43, was dead by the time help arrived.

title: Kylian Mbappé's scoring streak for Madrid has some wondering if he'll overtake Cristiano Ronaldo
desc: Kylian Mbappé’s latest impressive scoring run with Real Madrid has brought up Cristiano Ronaldo comparisons

title: Via Rail cancels trains in Ottawa on Monday
desc: Via Rail is cancelling several trips along the Ottawa-Montreal-Toronto corridor to “protect service reliability” during a period of “heightened operational pressure,’ according to the Crown corporation.

title: Private tutoring safeguarding checks leave critical gaps, LessonWise warns parents
desc: Private tutoring remains significantly less regulated than schools, leaving parents with limited visibility into safeguarding standards and gaps in child protection, according to UK-based education services company LessonWise.

title: Hopscotch Air Expands Operations in Boston
Abu Trica sues investigative bodies, FBI over 'unlawful' detention and interrogation in a GH¢10 million lawsuit
desc: Frederick Kumi, a.k.a Abu Trica has filed a lawsuit against the Minister of the Interior and other investigative bodies over the manner in which he was arrested in December 2025, detained and interrogated during investigations.

title: Savannah Guthrie’s Mom’s Kidnapping Questioned by Former FBI Official
desc: A former FBI official is questioning the kidnapping claims in the disappearance of Savannah Guthrie's mom, Nancy.
